inclusion.criterion: Type 2 diabetes on single or two doses of insulin therapy with or without metformin
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: On stable insulin doses, as defined by less than 10% changes in total daily insulin dose within 3 months prior to randomization
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Suboptimal glycaemic control with baseline HbA1c ≥8.0% and ≤10.5%, taken within 2 months prior to randomization
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Body mass index between 21 and 40 kg/m2
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Concurrent use of sulphonylurea or glucagon like peptide-1 receptor (GLP1) agonists
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has type 2 diabetes and is on insulin therapy, but has a history of ketoacidosis which makes them likely ineligible for the study.
